treatment.description: Plants 5–20 cm. Stems (branched proximally) tomentose (not stipitate-glandular). Leaves 10–18 × 3–4 cm, deeply pinnately lobed (lobed remote, lanceolate or linear, entire or dentate). Heads 2–9. Peduncles tomentulose, eglandular. Phyllaries 8–12, tomentulose, eglandular, often glabrous distally. Florets 12–40. Cypselae dark brown.

habitat_info.text: ridgetops , black shale hills , volcanic aggregate , gravelly soils ;
